Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>?
Oh, you won huh?
<PAGE>
You didn't have to come tell me.
I was in the audience, so I know. 
<PAGE>
...And? What do you
want me to say,
"congratulations"?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow.
You're not bad at all. 
<PAGE>
...What's with that silly grin? 
You're like a dog.
Does winning make you that happy?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You won in the advanced class, huh?
I like people who work hard.
I think it's great, to be honest.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
As a reward,
I'll let you ask me out
on a date sometime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Well, even if it's not as a reward, 
if you beg me enough
I probably won't say no, princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
I knew you could do it, <MYNAME>.
...Huh? You want to know how I knew?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're my princess.
My princess couldn't possibly lose.
Don't ask such obvious questions.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey. Stop grinning so
happily just because you won.
Other guys are watching you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Jealous? Who, me?
Don't be silly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You're my girlfriend,
so be quiet and do as I say.
Got it? What do you have to say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Good. Good girl.
I should be the only one
you smile at that way.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I knew you'd win the
beginner class easily, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You should try
a more challenging class.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're so modest, my princess.
That's what I like
about you, though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory.
I was watching you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Huh? You were so bothered by my staring
that you couldn't focus on the
festival?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>What are you talking about?
I watch you every day. I was
doing it even before we got married.
<PAGE>
Sheesh...You're as naive
as ever, even now we're married.
That's what I like about you, though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's just like you to win in
the advanced class, princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>As a reward,
I'll attend to you once in a while.
What would you like me to do for you?
<PAGE>
Shall I make you dinner?
Or help you with work?
I'll do whatever you want.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You lost? Hmm.
And? What do you want, <MYNAME>?
want me to say,
<PAGE>
I'm not going to comfort you or
anything silly like that. If you
want to be consoled, go somewhere else.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing wrong with
losing once in a while, is there?
<PAGE>
It's boring if you
win all the time.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't look so depressed
just because you lost.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Don't blame me for whatever happens
when you show up looking like that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You're pretty cute when
you're broken-hearted, you know.
<PAGE>
But if I had to pick,
I'd say I prefer it when
you smile, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So be sure to win next time
and give me a brilliant smile!
That's an order.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too bad you didn't win, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'll do something special for you
today. Shall I comfort you tenderly?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why do you look so sad?
Does losing hurt
that much?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You shouldn't get all depressed 
just because you lost.
Besides...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When you look like that,
it makes me want to tease you.
Huh? I'm mean? You only just noticed?
<PAGE>
...If you don't like it,
you need to smile brightly
like you always do.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd better not have lost
just so l would cheer you up.
You're such a naughty princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Huh, that's not it?
Yes it is.
Let's say that's what it is.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Were you sick or something today?
With your skill I thought
you could have won...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm not blaming you or anything.
I'm not so mean that I'd tease
my princess after she worked so hard.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not going to abandon you
just because you didn't win,
so don't worry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Am I disappointed? Of course not.
You're still my beloved princess,
same as ever.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yaks and cows
are the same shape.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Even I can't really tell
the difference between them.
Aren't they the same kind of animal?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>They aren't the same animal, but
yaks belong to the cow family right?
Really? Is that right.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You know more than I thought!
Well, that's expected of a farmer.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm not really
interested in yaks, but...
<PAGE>
I am interested in how you might raise
a yak that will bring home a win.
<PAGE>
I bet it feels great to earn a victory
with animals that you have cared for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Anyway, I'm plenty busy
working as a stylist.
I don't have time to raise animals.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats
on winning in the beginner class!
<PAGE>
You're very talented, so
you should try the
harder classes too, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'll be rooting for you!
Good luck!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on winning 
in the intermediate class!
You really are amazing, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I should follow
your example!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's like you to win in the advanced
class!  You're awesome!
<PAGE>
Now you've come this far, you ought
to aim for back-to-back victories! Work
hard so you can win again next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congratulations
on winning in the beginner class!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>My beloved girlfriend just won.
I'm as happy as if
I'd won myself!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Congrats
on winning in the intermediate class!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Seeing you work so hard
makes me feel like I should
try harder too, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
As your boyfriend, I've got to
become a guy who's worthy
of you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Congrats on winning the advanced class.
...Huh? I'm acting
funny, you say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Umm...Well...
I really am happy that
you won, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But...umm...
I don't want you
to get too popular, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I mean, then it'll be
like you belong to everyone.
You're MY girlfriend, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on winning, <MYNAME>!
Let's celebrate together when we get
home.
<PAGE>
What would you like for dinner?
I'll cook whatever you want,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Don't be shy!
You should at least take
it easy on days like this.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>!
I was sure
you'd win!
<PAGE>
After all, you work so
hard day after day, <MYNAME>.
I kept a close eye on you, so I know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But I was a little worried that you
might be working too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm your husband, you know.
You should depend on me a little more.
Let's work hard together!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>
congratulations on winning!
<PAGE>
Is it really okay for me to have
such a wonderful person as my wife?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm the happiest man
in the world with you
for a wife, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just too bad.
But you did your best, <MYNAME>.
I hope you can win next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done.
It's too bad you didn't win...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I think
just entering was
good enough.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It was the advanced class, after all. It
was bound to be full of strong opponents
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sure
you'll win next time, <MYNAME>!
Give it your best shot!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You didn't win today, but
I'm sure you'll be fine next time!
<PAGE>
So don't look
so sad, okay?
<PAGE>
When you look sad, it makes
me sad too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's too bad about today.
I really thought you were
going to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm...
I wonder what went wrong?
<PAGE>
Oh, I know! We should
ask Neil more about it
later on.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You did well, <MYNAME>.
It's too bad you didn't win...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It's just, umm... uh...
I'm sorry, I can't think of any
clever lines to cheer you up with. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish I could
make you smile at times
like these, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Sorry I'm such a useless boyfriend. 
I'll do my best until next time.
It'll be like my homework.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well done.
I'm sorry about today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, I've got an idea! 
How about I make dinner
tonight to cheer you up?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
You must be tired, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's have a relaxing cup
of tea together when we get home.
<PAGE>
Then the two of us can figure out how
you can win next time!
As your husband I want to help you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too bad you didn't win.
But I'm sure you were just a
little off your game today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know best how hard
you always work, <MYNAME>.
Let's go home and get some rest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! While we're at it, why
don't we hold hands on the way home?
Huh? Don't be embarrassed.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yaks are so stout, they
really look cool!
<PAGE>
They're usually relaxed,
but I bet they'd be really strong
if they had to fight.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If I were a farmer
I would love to raise yaks.
Because I really like how they look!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But raising them must be quite a
difficult task...I suppose raising any
animal is hard work.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>. Are you
going to try the intermediate class next
time?
<PAGE>
It doesn't matter whether you
win or not. You should try lots
of different things while you're young!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew you could do it, <MYNAME>.
Congratulations on winning!
<PAGE>
This old fellow had a great time
watching you. I'll be expecting
great things next time

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>.
Great job winning in the
advanced class.
<PAGE>
No one's a match for you now, huh?
I envy you young people.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Is it just me or did that
look like a piece of cake?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, it's probably because
I'm your boyfriend, <MYNAME>.
I can tell just by watching.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
It's great that you won.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm so happy you'd think
I'm the one who won.
Congratulations, I really mean it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>.
Congratulations on winning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I always have fun at
festivals when you take part, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm? What do I mean by that?
I don't mean it in a bad way.
It's a compliment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You look so sweet
when you're working hard that
I never tire of watching you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory, <MYNAME>.
I expected just as much, though.
<PAGE>
If I wasn't on a break,
I would have loved to
write an article about you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Of course, if I did write one, it would
be full of my opinions as your husband,
so it's just as well that I can't.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
You're amazing, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Come over here.
I'll caress you as
much as you want!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Winning in the advanced class is
a pretty big deal.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're so capable
no one would believe someone
like you could be my wife.
<PAGE>
I'm starting to think I should
get more serious as well. "More
serious about what?" That's a secret!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad about today.
But there's always next time.
It's only truly over when you give up.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sure you got plenty out of this
even though you didn't win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Just kidding. 
This old boy just wanted to spout
a few serious lines for the fun of it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You did well, <MYNAME>. All the
participants in the advanced class
were tough.
<PAGE>
Some of them were famous guys
I'd seen in a magazine before.
I was quite surprised!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There, there.
...Wait, huh? You don't
seem very sad, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>And here I thought
I was being all
considerate for once.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm your
boyfriend, after all, <MYNAME>.
It's my job to comfort you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You didn't win today, but
there's always next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Come to think of it...
I should find a book with tips on
winning for you before next time. 
<PAGE>
I've got to
try to help you
however I can, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good try, <MYNAME>.
You gave it your all out there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You may have lost today,
but I'm sure you'll
win next time, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I mean, come on. Anyone
capable of winning in the advanced
class has got to be seriously good. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So don't feel bad
that you lost this time!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just one of
those things.
There's no point moping about it. 
<PAGE>
Want to stop by somewhere before
we go home for a change of pace?
I'll keep you company.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah.
You did your best, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Don't worry,
I know you did. You were
just a little off your game today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now, let's go home.
I'm sure you'll forget all the
bad stuff once you're relaxing at home.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Aw...
You're upset.
<PAGE>
Don't cry just because
you didn't win.
<PAGE>
You'll make me sad if
you cry, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Uh... there, there. When we get home
I'll pamper you as much as you like.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bet you already know... Cows and sheep
come in a variety of colors, but
yaks are only black.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Actually, I've heard that they do
exist, but they're so hard to get a hold
of that only large store stock them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Unfortunately, I don't think we'll
be seeing any of them in this town.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just looking at those horns...
Now THIS is a yak!
...that's how I feel, at least.
<PAGE>
Good yak horns have a different color
and shape than normal ones.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Huh? I know a lot about yaks?
I used to work with them, long ago.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
The beginner class might be a little
too easy for you though, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Have you considered taking part
at the intermediate level next time?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My sincere congrats on your victory. I
get why Amir considers you a friend
<PAGE>
I am certain Amir is
overjoyed to hear that
you have won, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
allow me to offer my congratulations. 
That was a superb showing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Watching you out there
truly encouraged me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You must have some
mysterious power to encourage
people, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
I watched you from
beginning to end, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>To celebrate,
I'll make you some
tea, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>No one other than
Amir has ever made me
feel like making them tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
allow me to offer my congratulations. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Amir was so delighted by
your victory one would think
he had won himself.
<PAGE>
I am not one to show emotions,
so it is almost as if Amir
was your boyfriend, not me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Pardon? Oh, no. 
I am just a little uncomfortable...
I wonder why.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT>
My sincere congrats on your victory.
However, I do think you have what
it takes to aim even higher.
<PAGE>
I've been watching you every day.
There can be no doubt about it.
<PAGE>
Would you consider participating in the
intermediate class or higher next time?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Allow me to offer my congratulations. 
This is the result of your dedication. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>However, I am
a little concerned that you
might be working too hard, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Given your personality, however,
it might be hard for you to take things
easy even if I asked you to, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Please get some  rest, at least
for today. When we get back I
will make you some delicious tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sincere congratulations on your
victory in the advanced class.
You are truly impressive, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I am a happy man
to be married to someone like you.
<PAGE>
I will continue to work hard to
be a man who is worthy of
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Please stay by my side
from now on.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
You did well.
<PAGE>
Do not be disheartened.
Please rest today and prepare
for next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Although you did not get the result
you had hoped for, Amir and I
and everyone else in the
<PAGE>
town know how hard
you tried.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is unfortunate that
you were not victorious.
<PAGE>
However, the effort you
put in today was
surely not in vain. 
<PAGE>
There is nothing better than hard work. 
If you do not give up, I am confident
that you will do better next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
you did well.
<PAGE>
This is not my biased opinion as your
lover. I honestly believe the contest
was very close, but...
<PAGE>
An expert judge's opinion is
a very complicated thing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was
so upset by
the result that
<PAGE>
Amir had
to console me.
<PAGE>
That just will not do.
Not when I am supposed to be
comforting you instead, <MYNAME>,

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
Today's result was highly unfortunate.
<PAGE>
I wish I could do
something to take away
your sadness, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I don't know what I should say
as your boyfriend at times like this.
I apologize for being of so little use.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
You did well.
You must be tired.
<PAGE>
Please leave all the housework
to me and rest today
without a care. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You can go back to working hard from
tomorrow. I will do anything
I can to support you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's unfortunate about today's
results, but you worked hard, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
In fact, maybe you worked
a little too hard all by yourself.
Please allow me to assist you next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If we work hard as a couple, I am
sure we will win.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
You did well today.
<PAGE>
It's unfortunate that you did not win.
However these things do happen.
Please do not lose courage.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When we get home,
I'll make you a relaxing tea with
these herbs I just picked.
<PAGE>
Leave all the chores
to me and relax
with a cup of tea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I wonder if the yak that wins the Yak
Festival is feeling really proud of
himself right about now.
<PAGE>
Whether you are a human or an animal,
it must feel really good
to be recognized for your hard work.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yaks get bigger and bigger
every day, don't they.
<PAGE>
To see the yak that you've raised
grow even more
during the Festival...
<PAGE>
That must be
a profoundly emotional
sort of experience.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're not half bad, <MYNAME>.
Well, it's just the beginner
class. I'm not surprised you won.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good job, <MYNAME>!
You're better than I'd
thought.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Guess you're not a nobody
after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I can't believe you be those tough
guys in the advanced class so easily.
That's a bit of a surprise.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good job, <MYNAME>!
Isn't the beginner class too
easy for you, though?
<PAGE>
I'm sure you could do just as well
in the intermediate class or higher.
You should enter that next time.
<PAGE>
Oh, of course.
I'll cheer for you no matter which
one you enter.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'll do my job as the judge, 
but I'm your... boyfriend, after all.
Of course I'd support my girlfriend.
<PAGE>
...Don't make me 
say that out loud.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, yes, I was watching. I'm doing
the judging, so you don't need to
come and report to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I-Idiot!
Why did you get all tearful?
Just let it slide like you always do!
<PAGE>
Sheesh! Everyone's laughing,
watching me talk about stuff
like this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...You really don't care what people
around you think, huh. It bugs
me that I'm the only one who cares.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never thought you'd win in
the advanced class.
You're pretty good.
<PAGE>
You always act so clueless
when you're around me that
I'm totally surprised.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>What? Don't get mad.
I'm just telling it like it is.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aren't you bored in the beginner
class, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
With your skill, even the intermediate
